name: Пасьянсы (Паук, Косынка, Свободная ячейка)!
description:
Are you a Windows Solitaire addict? If so, you'll love the Amaya Solitaire app, which brings the three most popular solitaires - Klondike, Free Cell and Spider - to your device.

Features:
- play in two modes - portrait or landscape - by changing the position of your device.
- choose from 4 original themes, each with its own shirt
- a choice of 3 card designs
- Build detailed gameplay statistics, including game duration and number of wins
- Game is automatically saved each time you quit.
- Cancel your previous moves as many times as you wish
- Suitable for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad
